body_html: @kasyoukin I see. The 4239MB includes the memory used to initialize CUDA runtime, which is not counted as the 50% per_process_gpu_memory_fraction. per_process_gpu_memory_fraction only includes memory that will be allocated by TF for computational purposes. So I think this is expected, and we don't know how much memory the CUDA runtime is going to take.
